valid: For the period 18:00 (UTC) on Wed 4 Feb 2026 to 18:00 (UTC) on Thu 5 Feb 2026

Viking.text:
Wind
In southwest, southeasterly 7 to severe gale 9, decreasing 5 to 7 later. In northeast, southeasterly 5 to 7, veering northeasterly 3 or 4 later.
Sea state
In southwest, very rough or high, becoming rough or very rough. in northeast, rough or very rough at first, otherwise moderate or rough.
Weather
In southwest, sleet or snow. In northeast, mainly fair.
Visibility
In southwest, moderate to very poor, occasionally good later. In northeast, good.

Gale warning
Issued:
15:48 (UTC) on Wed 4 Feb 2026
Southeasterly severe gale force 9 decreasing gale force 8 soon
